scripts.build: yarn clean && tailwindcss -i ./styles/tailwind.css -o ./dist/tailwind.css --minify && html-minifier --input-dir . --output-dir dist --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js --minify-css --remove-attribute-quotes && cp -R assets/ dist/assets && cp middleware.js dist/ && cp theme-toggle.js dist/
